Return only the one-paragraph video description without Markdown formatting or introductory text.

If **shot size or spatial position** changes, describe how these transitions occur clearly, specifying both the **initial and final states**.

Shot Size Information: The video begins with a wide shot of the first subject. Then it becomes a full shot of the second subject.

The camera is positioned at the subject's level when the first subject is in focus, and below the subject when the second subject is in focus.
